content:
Revision marking example

Revision marking example

  • Before

  • After

Previous slide Next slide Back to the first slide View Graphic Version

Notes:

Here you can see a paragraph before and after it’s been edited with revision marks. In the after, you’ll see that one word was changed. The old word is struck out, the new word is emphasized, and there’s a bar on the side to draw your attention to this section of the document. Of course this display is all customizable.
